column4: hi i want to activate usb dispositive in mi virtual box but i don't know how!!!!! some one can help me please
hi i want to activate usb dispositive in mi virtual box but i don't know how!!!!! some one can help me please
i dont know if you can with virtualbox-ose, you may need the binary install, and even then you need to uncomment some lines in /etc/init.d/mountusbfs.sh
